maml:description.maml:para: Get or list Azure DevSpaces controller.
Get or list Azure DevSpaces controller.
Resource group name
DevSpaces controller name.
The credentials, account, tenant, and subscription used for communication with Azure.
Resource group name
The credentials, account, tenant, and subscription used for communication with Azure.
The credentials, account, tenant, and subscription used for communication with Azure.
DevSpaces controller name.
Resource group name

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Get-AzDevSpacesController
Name Resource Group Location Provisioning State ---------- -------------- -------- ------------------ devSpaceControllerName devSpaceResourceGroup eastus Succeeded

dev:remarks.maml:para: List all controllers in a subscription.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 2 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Get-AzDevSpacesController -ResourceGroupName devSpaceResourceGroup -Name devSpaceControllerName
Name Resource Group Location Provisioning State ---------- -------------- -------- ------------------ devSpaceControllerName devSpaceResourceGroup eastus Succeeded

dev:remarks.maml:para: Get a DevSpaces controllers in a subscription.

maml:description.maml:para: Create a new Azure DevSpaces controller.
Create a new Azure DevSpaces controller.
Resource Group Name.
DevSpaces Controller Name.
Target Resource Group Name.
Target Cluster Name.
Run cmdlet in the background
The credentials, account, tenant, and subscription used for communication with Azure.
A hash table which represents resource tags.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
New-AzDevSpacesController -ResourceGroupName devSpaceResourceGroup -Name devSpaceControllerName -TargetResourceGroupName clusterResourceGroup -TargetClusterName clusterName
Name Resource Group Location Provisioning State ---------- -------------- -------- ------------------ devSpaceControllerName devSpaceResourceGroup eastus Succeeded

dev:remarks.maml:para: Create a DevSpaces controller in resourcegroup devSpaceResourceGroup with a name devSpaceName. Use clusterName cluster as a target for this controller.
